{{c|void '''A_Look'''()}}

{{superseded|A_LookEx}}

== Usage ==
Makes the calling actor (presumably a monster) look for its enemies it can attack. If it finds a target, it enters its [[Actor_states#See|'''See''' state sequence]] where it'll normally chase and attack its target.

== Examples ==

Almost every monster in [[Doom]] uses '''A_Look'''. Here is code taken from the {{Class|DoomImp|Imp}} monster.

  Spawn:
    TROO AB 10 '''A_Look''';
    loop;

'''A_Look''' is called on every animation frame in the [[Actor_states#Spawn|'''Spawn''' state sequence]] to check for players.
